resources.string:
Fill in the blank! is an arithmetic game.

Choose Easy, Medium or Hard level in the settings menu.

Answer the question by typing on the number pad displayed and pressing enter. Press "C" to erase your mistakes. Each question may be from addition, subtraction, multiplication or division.

Each correct answer scores you one point and each incorrect answer deducts one point.

Your ten best scores will automatically be saved into Scores. Twitter app is required to share scores online and to share your scores, shake your phone.

App by Diraj Ravikumar. 

Floating Cities Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons By Attribution 3.0 License httpcreativecommons.orglicenses by 3.0
To share the score, allow EduGame to access your storage so that we can store the image
